spec_data.Name: sendxmpp
spec_data.Description:
Sendxmpp is a Perl script to send XMPP (Jabber) messages from the command
line, similar to what mail(1) does for mail. Messages can be sent both to
individual recipients and chat rooms.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:57:33 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A Perl script to send XMPP messages
